response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value for us and we believe it could be equally valuable to you. We are offering this remarkable piece at a special introductory price of $18,000. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 18000}
